title: VIEWS! Top Floor In-Unit Laundry-Hardwood Floors+More // Blocks to CAL
app_fee: $30 application fee per person over 18 years of age
posting_body: ['AVAILABLE NOW - BLOCKS FROM CAL //', 'North Berkeley Studio w/incredible views + in-unit laundry + parking', '+ more!', "-- Won't last long!", 'Wellington Property Company is pleased to offer our gorgeous, fully remodeled studio apartment (#32) located on tree-lined 1525 Spruce Street in the highly desirable neighborhood of North Berkeley and the Gourmet Ghetto.', 'This sophisticated 24-unit building was fully remodeled and upgraded in 2015 – all power, electrical, plumbing, heating, windows and fixtures are state of the art.', 'The building is walkable and conveniently located within 4 blocks of UC Berkeley campus, Downtown Berkeley BART, Cheeseboard, 1 block to the original Peet’s Coffee, CVS Pharmacy, Safeway and more.', 'Unit #32 is located on the uppermost floor with incredible Bay views.', 'UNIT HIGHLIGHTS:', '- Studio on uppermost floor w/VIEWS!', '- Fresh paint throughout', '- In-unit washer/dryer', '- Natural hardwood floors throughout', '- New ceiling fan', '- Kitchen:', 'Quartz countertops, subway tiles, white cabinets, stainless steel appliances: refrigerator, microwave & dishwasher, gas range', '- Breakfast nook', '- Ample closet space', '- High-end windows', '- Bathroom:', 'Shower/tub combo w/subway tiles', '- Connected for private high-speed internet', 'BUILDING HIGHLIGHTS:', '- Intercom access', '- Secured entry', '- Amazon Key for Business', '- Security cameras', '- Ample street parking', 'LEASE TERMS: (AVAILABLE NOW!)', 'Rental Amount: $2,700 per month (1 year lease)', 'Security Deposit: $3,000 security deposit', 'Off-Street parking optional for additional $100/month (Inquire with Resident Manager)', 'Tenant pays all utilities', 'Sorry, no pets.', 'Available Now – first come, first qualified!', 'This property is subject to the Fair Chance Ordinance.', 'CONTACT:', 'Anthony Brown, Resident Manager', 'Text/Call:', 'show contact info', '(text preferred for faster response)', '***PLEASE CONTACT ANTHONY DIRECTLY***']
